english: Friction soon developed in the colony .
chinese: 没有多久，移民队内部发生了龃龉。
欧洲大量地向美国移民。

english: Migrants feel uprooted from friends and relatives .
chinese: 移民有一种亲友别离，情谊割断之感。

english: The quota of immigrants for this year has already been filled .
chinese: 本年度的移民限额已满。

english: One of his forefathers was an early settler in america .
chinese: 他的祖先之一是美洲的早期移民。
移民造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: In addition, urban migrants add to the supply of labor .
chinese: 此外，城市移民还增加了劳动的供应。

english: Despite continuing immigration, artisans were scarce .
chinese: 尽管移民不断增加，但技工还是很缺乏。

english: The new settlers wore the finest silk and velvet clothing .
chinese: 新来的移民穿着最华丽的丝绸和天鹅绒衣服。

english: She was a real immigrant mother, the backbone of the family .
chinese: 她是百分之百的移民母亲，是一家的支柱。

english: The big irishman with the immigration badge looked at him .
chinese: 那个带着移民局证章的大个子爱尔兰人瞧着他。

english: Roosevelt promised to use diplomacy to stop japanese immigration .
chinese: 罗斯福答应通过外交途径停止日本移民。

english: This country has large numbers of expatriates or immigrant populations .
chinese: 这个国家有大量被放逐者或移民。

english: Many of these immigrants were now coming from central and eastern europe .
chinese: 其中有许多移民来自中欧和东欧。

english: Not all those who emigrated to america did so for exalted reasons .
chinese: 移民来美，并不是个个都为了崇高的目标。

english: The old yankees stopped at nothing to subjugate the irish immigrants .
chinese: 老美国佬不顾一切地要制服爱尔兰移民。
